chunks.title: Solana Token Contracts and Technical Specifications
chunks.body: ⚠️ WARNING: Always verify contract addresses on Solscan.io before use. Solana token contract addresses, decimals, and technical specifications for popular tokens. These addresses require verification and may change over time.
chunks.summary_en: Authoritative Solana token contract addresses with decimals and technical specifications for accurate transfers.
chunks.summary_zh: 权威的Solana代币合约地址，包含小数位数和技术规格，确保准确转账。

contracts.name: Raydium

technical_notes: ⚠️ VERIFICATION REQUIRED: Check all addresses on https://solscan.io before use
All SPL tokens use the same program ID: TokenkegQfeZyiNwAJbNbGKPFXCWuBvf9Ss623VQ5DA
Solana uses base58 encoding for addresses
Native SOL transfers don't require a token program
Contract addresses may change - never use without current verification
